Hero.Title: Transform Education with Our Comprehensive Learning Platform
Hero.Subtitle: Empower educators, engage students, and streamline administration with our all-in-one educational solution featuring course management, online exams, and powerful analytics.

Features.Title: Everything You Need for Modern Education
Features.Subtitle: Our comprehensive platform provides all the tools needed to deliver exceptional educational experiences.

CourseManagement.Title: Course Management
CourseManagement.Description: Create and organize courses with hierarchical structure: Years → Terms → Units → Lessons. Easy content management and progress tracking.

OnlineExams.Title: Online Exams & Quizzes
OnlineExams.Description: Build comprehensive exams with multiple question types, automated grading, and detailed analytics for student performance.

Assignment.Title: Assignment System
Assignment.Description: Create, distribute, and grade assignments with file uploads, rubrics, and automated deadline management.

Analytics.Title: Powerful Analytics
Analytics.Description: Track student progress, course effectiveness, and institutional performance with detailed reports and insights.

Community.Title: Learning Community
Community.Description: Foster collaboration with discussion forums, study groups, and peer-to-peer learning features.

MultiLanguage.Title: Multi-Language Support
MultiLanguage.Description: Full Arabic and English support with RTL layout for inclusive global education.

Pricing.Title: Choose Your Plan
Pricing.Subtitle: Flexible pricing for institutions of all sizes

Setup.Question: How quickly can we get started?
Setup.Answer: You can set up your educational platform in just a few minutes. Create your account, invite your team, and start building courses immediately.

Support.Question: What kind of support do you provide?
Support.Answer: We offer 24/7 support for all users, with priority support for premium plans. Our team includes educational technology specialists to help you succeed.

Migration.Question: Can we migrate from our existing system?
Migration.Answer: Yes! We provide comprehensive migration tools and assistance to help you transfer your existing courses, student data, and content seamlessly.
